http://schema.org/isLiveBroadcast.description: True is the broadcast is of a live event.

http://schema.org/multipleValues.description: Whether multiple values are allowed for the property. Default is false.

http://schema.org/requiresSubscription.description: Indicates if use of the media require a subscription (either paid or free). Allowed values are true or false (note that an earlier version had 'yes', 'no').

http://schema.org/valueAddedTaxIncluded.description: Specifies whether the applicable value-added tax (VAT) is included in the price specification or not.

http://schema.org/valueRequired.description: Whether the property must be filled in to complete the action. Default is false.

http://schema.org/isGift.description: Was the offer accepted as a gift for someone other than the buyer.

http://schema.org/isAvailableGenerically.description: True if the drug is available in a generic form (regardless of name).

http://schema.org/isAccessibleForFree.description: A flag to signal that the publication is accessible for free. Supersedes free.

http://schema.org/value.description: The value of the quantitative value or property value node. For QuantitativeValue, the recommended type for values is 'Number'. For PropertyValue, it can be 'Text;', 'Number', 'Boolean', or 'StructuredValue'.

http://schema.org/isFamilyFriendly.description: Indicates whether this content is family friendly.

http://schema.org/isProprietary.description: True if this item's name is a proprietary/brand name (vs. generic name).

http://schema.org/acceptsReservations.description: Indicates whether a FoodEstablishment accepts reservations. Values can be Boolean, a URL at which reservations can be made or (for backwards compatibility) the strings Yes or No.

http://schema.org/readonlyValue.description: Whether or not a property is mutable. Default is false. Specifying this for a property that also has a value makes it act similar to a "hidden" input in an HTML form.

http://schema.org/representativeOfPage.description: Indicates whether this image is representative of the content of the page.
